Pre-Game Insights: India will play their seventh match of the 2023 World Cup against Sri Lanka at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai on 2 November.
India has won six consecutive matches in the tournament so far.
Sri Lanka lost their first three matches but recovered to post important wins over Netherlands and England.
Depending on the result of their match against Afghanistan on 30 October, Sri Lanka's hopes of a top four finish may still be alive.
India and Sri Lanka have faced off on 167 occasions in ODIs, with India winning 98 of those matches.
India is considered the favorite given their current form and home advantage.
